name: DOCS_RCVD_RSLT_SENS
description: This table contains result sensitivity information.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: RESULT_SENS_KEY
columns.description: Key for looking up the order for this sensitivity in the DOCS_RCVD_RSLTS table

columns.name: RESULT_SENS_ORGANISM_NAM
columns.description: Free text name of the sensitivity organism

columns.name: RESULT_SENS_ORGANISM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Organism for the received document result sensitivity.

columns.name: RESULT_SENS_ANTIBIOTIC_NAM
columns.description: Free text name of the antibiotic used

columns.name: RESULT_SENS_ANTIBIOTIC_C_NAME
columns.description: The antibiotic category ID for the received document result sensitivity.

columns.name: RESULT_SENS_SUSCEPT_NAM
columns.description: Free text name of the susceptibility result

columns.name: RESULT_SENS_SUSCEPT_C_NAME
columns.description: The susceptibility category ID of the organism to the given antibiotic for the received document result sensitivity.

columns.name: RESULT_SENS_COMMENT
columns.description: Free text comment for this sensitivity

columns.name: RESULT_SENS_MTHD_NAM
columns.description: Free text name of the method used to perform the susceptibility

columns.name: RESULT_SENS_MTHD_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure for the received document result sensitivity method.
